Key.English: Warfare is a blend of a team-based multiplayer mission and realtime strategy, where BLUFOR and OPFOR fight for the island control. Key objectives are to capture towns, defend your base and destroy the base of enemy. Both sides are lead by a commander, who influences his side's strategy. There are two kinds of resources: Supply points are used by the commander for building factories. Money is used to purchase weapons, units and vehicles
Key.French: Warfare is a blend of a team-based multiplayer mission and realtime strategy, where BLUFOR and OPFOR fight for the island control. Key objectives are to capture towns, defend your base and destroy the base of enemy. Both sides are lead by a commander, who influences his side's strategy. There are two kinds of resources: Supply points are used by the commander for building factories. Money is used to purchase weapons, units and vehicles
Key.German: Warfare is a blend of a team-based multiplayer mission and realtime strategy, where BLUFOR and OPFOR fight for the island control. Key objectives are to capture towns, defend your base and destroy the base of enemy. Both sides are lead by a commander, who influences his side's strategy. There are two kinds of resources: Supply points are used by the commander for building factories. Money is used to purchase weapons, units and vehicles
Key.Russian:
Краткое руководство по игре на карте Warfare

Боевые действия проходят в различных локациях, на которых располагается множество селений (посёлков и городов), обычно их около 40. В начале игры все они принадлежат Местным, одинаково враждебным как к команде Красных, так и к команде Синих.
На карте независимые селения обычно отображаются зеленым (на проекте WASP синим) цветом (здесь и далее для удобства изложения будем говорить об обычно используемых игровых настройках). Все игроки изначально (ещё до непосредственного вступления в игру) делятся на команды красных и синих, выбирая тот или иной слот (в некоторых версиях миссии так же можно играть и за Местных (Зеленых)). После загрузки карты сменить сторону уже нельзя (при попытке перезайти по умолчанию Вас будет выкидывать из игры, что не лишает, однако, возможности опять вступить в неё за "свою" сторону)
Key.Italian: Warfare is a blend of a team-based multiplayer mission and realtime strategy, where BLUFOR and OPFOR fight for the island control. Key objectives are to capture towns, defend your base and destroy the base of enemy. Both sides are lead by a commander, who influences his side's strategy. There are two kinds of resources: Supply points are used by the commander for building factories. Money is used to purchase weapons, units and vehicles
Key.Portuguese: Warfare é uma missão multiplayer que mistura jogo em equipe e estratégia em tempo real, onde BLUFOR e OPFOR lutam pelo controle da ilha. os objetivos principais são (capturar cidades, defender sua base e destruir a base do inimigo). ambos os lados são liderados por um comandate, o qual influencia na estratégia do time. Onde existem dois tipos de recursos: Pontos de Suprimentos(Supply) são usados pelo comandante para construir fabricas. Dinheiro é usado para comprar armas,unidades e veículos

Key.English: After starting the warfare mission, you are confronted with the Vote Commander screen. Click on any name in the player list to cast your vote. If you join a game that has already started, you will not see the Vote Commander screen. A new vote for a new Commander can be started anytime using the Vote option in the Options interface. The commander assigns a mission and a role to a team leader, whether it be AI or human player. The role can include the type of equipment and vehicles the AI teams will use. Players have control of what they will use in their team. Mission is the task for the team to perform. You may disable the Commander Vote Pop-up in the Team Menu

Key.Russian: После старта миссии, появляется окно Выбора Командира. Отдайте свой голос за какого-либо игрока, кликнув по его имени. Если вы вошли в уже начатую игру, вы не увидите окно Выбора Командира. Начать новые выборы можно в любой момент игры, запуск выборов доступен в WFMenu. Вы можете отключить автоматическое появление окна Выборов Командира в меню Настройки

Key.Portuguese: Depois de começar um missão no modo warfare, você se depara com a tela de voto do comandante. Clique em qualquer nome da lista de jogadores para realizar seu voto. Se você entrar em uma partida que ja estava acontecendo, você não verá a tela de voto do comandante. Uma nova votação para um novo comandante pode ser feita a qualquer momento, usando a opção de voto na interface de opções. O comandante escolhe a missão e um papel para o lider do time, sendo ele um AI ou um jogador. O papel deve incluir o tipo de equipamento e veículos que os times vão usar. Jogadores tem controle sobre o que vão usar em seu time. Missão é o papel que o time deve executar. Você pode desabilitar a notificação de voto de comandante no menu do time

Key.English: The Commander can be controlled either by player or by AI. He has access to extra resources and abilities: developing the base, setting objectives for teams, and defining the strategy of your side
Key.French: The Commander can be controlled either by player or by AI. He has access to extra resources and abilities: developing the base, setting objectives for teams, and defining the strategy of your side
Key.German: The Commander can be controlled either by player or by AI. He has access to extra resources and abilities: developing the base, setting objectives for teams, and defining the strategy of your side
Key.Russian: Командиром может быть игрок или ИИ. Командир имеет следующие полномочия: строительство баз, обозначение целей для команд и в целом определяет стратегию развития стороны
Key.Italian: The Commander can be controlled either by player or by AI. He has access to extra resources and abilities: developing the base, setting objectives for teams, and defining the strategy of your side
Key.Portuguese: O comandante pode ser controlado por um jogador ou por um AI. Ele tem acesso à recursos extras e habilidades: construir a base, definir objetivos para o time e definir a estrategia para o seu time

Key.English: All players and AI soldiers can buy subordinates, equipment and vehicles from the main base as well as some vehicles from the captured town forts. You can access all available facilities through the Purchase interface from inside the main base perimeter or anywhere on the map once a Command Center has been erected. Accessible supply factories are indicated by icons on right edge of the screen. If a Barracks has been built, select the Purchase Gear button to purchase weapons and ammunition. The equipment you purchase here will also be your starting kit when you respawn. In Purchase Units button, you will find a list of unit type icons along the top. Here you can buy empty or manned units from soldiers to aircraft

Key.Russian: Каждый игрок может нанимать подчиненных, покупать снаряжение и технику, как на своей базе, так и в депотах захваченных городов. Меню покупок доступно в пределах периметра вашей базы или в радиусе действия Командного Центра, при наличии соответсвующих построек. Наличие построек отображено в виде иконок в правой части экрана. Находясь возле Казарм или Пограничного Бункера города можно вызывать меню покупки снаряжения. Последнее купленное снаряжение остается у Вас даже после смерти. В меню Отряды можно увидеть список всех видов юнитов доступных для покупки. Здесь можно купить различные типы юнитов начиная пехотинцами и заканчиваю боевой авиацией

Here you can buy empty or manned units from soldiers to aircraft
Key.Portuguese: Todos os jogadores e AIs, podem comprar subordinados, equipamentos e veículos da base principal, tanto quanto podem comprar veículos no centro das cidades capturadas. Você pode acessar todas as fabricas através da interface de compras dentro do perimetro da base ou em qualquer lugar do mapa que esteja coberto pela área do Centro de Comando, desde que ja esteja contruido. As fabricas acessiveis são indicadas pelos icones no canto direito da tela. Se as barracas estiverem construidas, selecione o botão comprar equipamento (Gear) para comprar armas, munições e uniforme. O equipamento que você comprar, tambem será seu equipamento quando você renascer. No botão de comprar unidades, você vai encontrar uma lista de icones de tipos de unidades na parte de cima, onde você pode comprar veículos cheios ou com tripulantes designados para certas funções

Key.English: The commander builds a base. Each side starts with one Mobile Headqarters (MHQ). This is a vehicle the commander can use to build th headquarters (HQ) anywhere on the map. After the HQ is built, other buildings can be constructed. Only the commander can build factories and defenses around the base using the HQ. The HQ can also be packed up back as MHQ again and moved to another location
Key.French: The commander builds a base. Each side starts with one Mobile Headqarters (MHQ). This is a vehicle the commander can use to build th headquarters (HQ) anywhere on the map. After the HQ is built, other buildings can be constructed. Only the commander can build factories and defenses around the base using the HQ. Key.Russian: Строительством баз занимается Командир Стороны. Каждая сторона начинает игру с Мобильным Штабом (MHQ). Чтобы начать строительство базы Мобильный Штаб необходимо развернуть. Сделать это можно в любом месте карты. Развернутый штаб можно снова мобилизовать и переместить в любую точку местности

Key.Portuguese: O comandante constroi a base. Cada lado começa com um Centro de Comando Móvel (MHQ). Esse é um veículo que o comandante pode usar para construir o Quartel General (HQ) em qualquer lugar do mapa, após o Quartel General ter sido construido, outras construções podem ser feitas. Apenas o comandante pode construir fabricas e defesas em volta da base. O Quartel General tambem pode ser transformado novamente em sua forma móvel (MHQ) e movido para outra localização

Key.English: Each captured town has an Actual and Potential Value. On the map you will see this represented as 2 numbers seperated by a / for example; Zelenogorsk, once captured will start as 30/120. This means that the current supplies to each player from this town is $30 per minute. Each time a supply truck arrives at the town depot its value will increase by 10. Remember though, the supply truck must be either fully loaded from the HQ or a Supply point or, have come from a town with a higher actual value. you will also receive 4 x the actual value as cash if you or one of your squad drives the truck. Supply runs should be the responsibility of all. The best way to win Warfare is to work together capping and then supping up the town before moving to another

Key.Russian: Каждый захваченный город имеет текущий и потенциальный уровень производства дохода (Town SV). На карте это обозначено двумя числами разделенными /. Например: Зеленогорск сразу после захвата приносит 30 очков снабжения и обозначен 30/120. Кроме очков снабжения города также приности деньги, с параметрами распределения дохода по-умолчанию, каждый игрок получает $1 с одного Town SV. С параметрами Миссии по-умолчанию каждый город приносит доход (снабжение и деньги) раз в минуту, а так же мощность дохода от города (Town SV) тоже увеличивается раз в минуту (30/120, 31/120, 32/120 и т.д.). Ускорить процесс роста Town SV можно с помощью улучшение "Снабжение". Чем больше захвачено городв и чем больше каждый из них приносит дохода в единицу времени, тем быстрее развивается сторона (делаются улучшения, строятся базы, нанимаются юниты). Также текущий Town SV города влияет на количество обороны, котороя появится при его активации
Key.Italian: Each captured town has an Actual and Potential Value. On the map you will see this represented as 2 numbers seperated by a / for example; Zelenogorsk, once captured will start as 30/120. This means that the current supplies to each player from this town is $30 per minute. Each time a supply truck arrives at the town depot its value will increase by 10. Remember though, the supply truck must be either fully loaded from the HQ or a Supply point or, have come from a town with a higher actual value. you will also receive 4 x the actual value as cash if you or one of your squad drives the truck. Supply runs should be the responsibility of all. The best way to win Warfare is to work together capping and then supping up the town before moving to another
Key.Portuguese: Cada cidade capturada tem um valor atual e um valor potencial. No mapa, você os verá representado como 2 numeros separados por uma / por exemplo; Zelenogorsk, quando capturada vai começar como 30/120. Isso significa que a quantidade atual de suprimentos dessa cidade é de $30 por minuto. Cada vez que um caminhão de suprimento chega ao centro da cidade, o valor cresce por 10. Lembrando que, o caminhão de suprimento deve estar totalmente carregado pelo Quartel General ou por um ponto de suprimento ou ter vindo de uma cidade com um valor de suprimento atual maior. Você tambem receberá 4x o valor atual de dinheiro se você ou alguem do seu esquadrão dirigir o caminhão. Os suprimentos devem ser responsabilidade de toda equipe. A melhor forma de ganhar o warfare é trabalhando junto, capturando cidades e reabastecendo-as e depois movendo-se para outra

Key.English: To be able to purchase higher levels of equipment or units, the factories need to be upgraded by the commander. The commander will need both cash and supply points to do this. He may ask for contributions from other team players to help out. Each factory has 3 levels
Key.French: To be able to purchase higher levels of equipment or units, the factories need to be upgraded by the commander. The commander will need both cash and supply points to do this. He may ask for contributions from other team players to help out. Each factory has 3 levels
Key.German: To be able to purchase higher levels of equipment or units, the factories need to be upgraded by the commander. The commander will need both cash and supply points to do this. He may ask for contributions from other team players to help out. Each factory has 3 levels
Key.Russian: Для возможности покупки новой техники, снаряжения или солдат, требуется выполнять улучшения. Проведение улучшений требует очков снабжения и в некоторых случаях денег. Запускать исследование на Улучшение может только Командир. Каждый завод производства техники имеет 3 уровня улучшений, начиная с нулевого
Key.Italian: To be able to purchase higher levels of equipment or units, the factories need to be upgraded by the commander. The commander will need both cash and supply points to do this. He may ask for contributions from other team players to help out. Each factory has 3 levels
Key.Portuguese: Para que seja possivel comprar equipamentos ou unidades de level alto, as fabricas precisam de suas pesquisas completas pelo comandante. O comandante vai precisar de dinheiro e suprimento para fazer isso. Ele pode pedir por contribuições de outros jogadores para ajuda-lo. Cada fabriga tem por volta de 3 leveis

Key.English:
It is forbidden:

1. Usage of cheats.

2. Usage of scripts and addons that could give the player a certain advantage.

3. Intentional BUG usage:
a) BUG usage by player to respwan on technical respawn on the opposite site of the map.
b) BUG usage by comannder to deploy MHQ or factories inside of the textures and deploying recently destroyed MHQ using construction menu.

4. Violation of defined map borders: deploying MHQ or factories outside map borders.

5. Violation of defined construction rules:
a) It is forbidden to use more than one cammo net layer.
b) It is forbidden to build "ring-like" walls without entrance.
c) It is forbidden to build around bunkers leaving no entrance to it.

6. Violation of behavior rules: swearing, insults, spam, team-kill, AFK more than 15 min.,NO VOTING for commander, firing at base (even for callibration!), robbery and destruction of friendly vehicles (except if enemy inside of it!), enemy units extinction at technical respawn, respawn construction over technical respawn in order to send recruits to it, assault and destruction of friendly MHQ and factories, marking friendly factories in "global channel", cause difficulties to teammates during game progress...

VIOLATION OF THESE RULES WILL RESULTE IN BAN ON ALL ArmA2.ru SERVERS FOR DIFFERENT DELAYS REGARDING THE GRAVITY OF VIOLATION!!!

CHEATERS WILL BE BANNED PERMANENTLY!!!
Key.French:
It is forbidden:

1. Usage of cheats.

2. Usage of scripts and addons that could give the player a certain advantage.

3. Intentional BUG usage:
a) BUG usage by player to respwan on technical respawn on the opposite site of the map.
b) BUG usage by comannder to deploy MHQ or factories inside of the textures and deploying recently destroyed MHQ using construction menu.

4. Violation of defined map borders: deploying MHQ or factories outside map borders.

5. Violation of defined construction rules:
a) It is forbidden to use more than one cammo net layer.
b) It is forbidden to build "ring-like" walls without entrance.
c) It is forbidden to build around bunkers leaving no entrance to it.

6. Violation of behavior rules: swearing, insults, spam, team-kill, AFK more than 15 min.,NO VOTING for commander, firing at base (even for callibration!), robbery and destruction of friendly vehicles (except if enemy inside of it!), enemy units extinction at technical respawn, respawn construction over technical respawn in order to send recruits to it, assault and destruction of friendly MHQ and factories, marking friendly factories in "global channel", cause difficulties to teammates during game progress...

VIOLATION OF THESE RULES WILL RESULTE IN BAN ON ALL ArmA2.ru SERVERS FOR DIFFERENT DELAYS REGARDING THE GRAVITY OF VIOLATION!!!

CHEATERS WILL BE BANNED PERMANENTLY!!!
Key.German:
It is forbidden:

1. Usage of cheats.

2. Usage of scripts and addons that could give the player a certain advantage.

3. Intentional BUG usage:
a) BUG usage by player to respwan on technical respawn on the opposite site of the map.
b) BUG usage by comannder to deploy MHQ or factories inside of the textures and deploying recently destroyed MHQ using construction menu.

4. Violation of defined map borders: deploying MHQ or factories outside map borders.

5. Violation of defined construction rules:
a) It is forbidden to use more than one cammo net layer.
b) It is forbidden to build "ring-like" walls without entrance.
c) It is forbidden to build around bunkers leaving no entrance to it.

6. Violation of behavior rules: swearing, insults, spam, team-kill, AFK more than 15 min.,NO VOTING for commander, firing at base (even for callibration!), robbery and destruction of friendly vehicles (except if enemy inside of it!), enemy units extinction at technical respawn, respawn construction over technical respawn in order to send recruits to it, assault and destruction of friendly MHQ and factories, marking friendly factories in "global channel", cause difficulties to teammates during game progress...

VIOLATION OF THESE RULES WILL RESULTE IN BAN ON ALL ArmA2.ru SERVERS FOR DIFFERENT DELAYS REGARDING THE GRAVITY OF VIOLATION!!!

CHEATERS WILL BE BANNED PERMANENTLY!!!
Key.Russian:
В миссии WASP WARFARE Запрещено:

1. Использование читов...

2. Скриптов, модов, позволяющих получить преимущество и не разрешенных на сервере...

3. Умышленное багоюзанье:
а) использование багов игроками: умышленное возроджение в зоне технического респауна с целью попасть на противоположную сторону карты, ....
б) использование багов командующими:разворачивание MHQ и заводов в текстурах, телепортация MHQ, баговый разворот MHQ из Меню строительства в момент ее уничтожения ...

4. Нарушение установленных границ : постройка заводов за границами, развертывание MHQ за границами.

5. Нарушение правил строительства объектов:
а) запрещается обтягивать заводы маск сетками более чем в один слой.
б) запрещается строить закольцованные стены без прохода.
в) запрещается застраивать бункеры в городах не оставляя прохода.

6. Нарушение правил поведения:
*мат, оскорбления, флуд,
*умышленный злостный тимкилл, стрельба на базе ради стрельбы или "пристрелки" оружия,
*воровство и уничтожение дружественной техники (за исключением случаев когда в ней враг),
*отстрел противника в зоне технического респа, а также строить на нем респ и отправлять на него ботов, атака и уничтожение дружественных заводов и MHQ,
*нанесение маркеров на дружественные базы в общем канале,
*умышленное создание помех игрокам своей команды,
*нахождение в не игры (AFK) более 15мин,
*НЕ ГОЛОСОВАНИЕ за командующего ...

За эти нарушения предусматривается наказание в виде изгнания из игры и запрета доступа (бан) к серверам arma2.ru.
Сроки наказания рассматриваются индивидуально.
Читерам разбана не будет никогда!

Key.English:
One of our scout team has reported us that multiple resistance squads are heading toward our base.

According to the report, theirs arrival is imminent, we will have to defend the base at all cost, HQ has ordered us to neutralize the threat even if the base is lost.
Key.French:
Une de nos équipes de reconnaissance nous a informé de l'arrivé de plusieurs escouades resistantes vers notre base.

D'après le rapport officiel, leurs arrivées est imminente. Nous allons devoir défendre la base à tout prix, le QG nous a ordonné de neutraliser cette menace même si la base est perdue.
Key.German:
Eine unserer Aufklärungseinheit hat soeben berichtet, dass mehrere Einheiten des Widerstand, auf unser Hauptquartier zumaschieren.

Dem Bericht zufolge, steht ihre Ankunft und ein damit verbundener Angriff unmittelbar bevor. Das Hauptquartier muss unter allen Umständen verteidigt und die Aggressoren eliminiert werden, koste es was es wolle.
Key.Russian:
Одна из наших разведкоманд сообщает о многочисленных отрядах сопротивления приближающихся к нашей базе.

Из их доклада следует что нападение неизбежно, мы должны защитить базу любой ценой, штаб приказал нейтрализовать угрозу даже если база уничтожена.
Key.Italian:
One of our scout team has reported us that multiple resistance squads are heading toward our base.

According to the report, theirs arrival is imminent, we will have to defend the base at all cost, HQ has ordered us to neutralize the threat even if the base is lost.
Key.Portuguese:
Uma escolta do time reportou multiplos esquadrões de resistencias dirigindo-se à nossa base.

de acordo com a escolta, a chegada deles é iminente, precisaremos defender nossa base a qualquer custo! o Quartel General ordenou que neutralize essa ameaça mesmo se a base for perdida.

Key.English:
HQ warned us about an incomming mercenary helicopter hunting down our Squadleaders.

Your mission is to locate and destroy that helicopter.
Key.French:
Le QG nous à alerté de l'arrivée d'un hélicoptère mercenaire chassant nos chefs d'équipes.

Votre mission est de trouver et détruire cette hélicoptère.
Key.German:
Das Hauptquartier warnt vor einem feindlichen Hubschrauber, der Jagd auf unsere Squadleader macht.

Die Mission ist es, den Hubschrauber zu lokalisieren und zu zerstören.
Key.Russian:
Штаб уведомил нас о приближающемся вертолете наемников,охотящимся на командиров отделений.

Ваша задача - обнаружить и уничтожить вертолет.
Key.Italian:
HQ warned us about an incomming mercenary helicopter hunting down our Squadleaders.

Your mission is to locate and destroy that helicopter.
Key.Portuguese:
O Quartel General nos avisou que há um helicoptero mercenario caçando nossos lideres de esquadrão.

Sua missão é encontrar e destruir esse helicoptero.

Key.English:
Our intels has informed us that a resistance commander is planning an attack on %1.

The attack will be launched soon, make sure to defend that town at all cost.

A Search and Destroy mission will be necessary to complete %1 defense.
Key.French:
Nos renseignements nous indique qu'un commandant resistant plannifie d'attaquer %1.

L'attaque doit avoir lieu bientôt, assurez-vous de défendre cette ville à tout prix.

Une mission de Recherche et Destruction sera nécessaire finaliser la défense de %1.
Key.German:
Unser Geheimdienst hat Informationen, dass der Commander des Widerstands einen Angriff auf %1.

plant. Der Angriff wird voraussichtlich in Kürze stattfinden. Verteidige die Stadt unter allen Umständen.

Eine Search and Destroy Mission wird notwendig sein, um die Verteidigung von %1 sicherzustellen.
Key.Russian:
Наша разведка сообщила нам, что командующий силами сопротивления планирует нападение на %1.

Наступление начнется скоро, будте уверены, этот город должен быть защищен любой ценой.

Необходимо найти и уничтожить силы сопротивления %1 defense.
Key.Italian:
La nostra Inteligence ci ha informato che commando della resistenza sta pianificando un attacco a %1.

L'attacco verra lanciato preso, assicurati di difentere questa città a tutti i costi.

Una missione di ricerca e distruzione sarà necessaria per completare la difesa di %1.
Key.Portuguese:
Nossa inteligencia informou-nos que o comandante da resistencia está planejando um ataque em %1.

O ataque sera lançado em breve, assegure-se de denfender essa cidade a qualquer custo.

Uma missão de procura e destruição será necessaria para completar %1 defesa.

Key.English:
From what we've learned from our intels, an UAV has been shot down in this area, retrieving it's module is essential for our team as it contains critical intel about enemy forces.

Once that your team has secured the crash site, we will send a team to retrieve the module, make sure to protect them.
Key.French:
D'après ce que nos renseignements nous ont appris, un Drone a été abattu dans cette zone, il est essentiel de recupérer son module en raison d'importants renseignements qu'il contient sur les forces enemies.

Une fois le site du crash sécurisé, nous enverrons une équipe récuperer le module, assurez-vous de les protéger.
Key.German:
Von dem was wir von unserem Geheimdienst wissen, wurde in dieser Gegend ein UAV abgeschossen. Das UAV hat im Laufe seines Einsatzes sehr wichtige Informationen über die feindlichen Streitkräfte sammeln können, die für uns von strategischer Wichtigkeit sind. Deshalb hat die Bergung des Moduls oberste Priorität.

Sobald die Absturzstelle gesichert wurde, werden wir einen Bergungstrupp aussenden, um das Modul zu bergen. Sichere die Absturzstelle, bis die Bergung abgeschlossen ist!
Key.Russian:
По данным нашей разведки БЛА был сбит в этом районе, нужно вернуть модуль БЛА так как он важен для нашей команды, поскольку содержит критически важные сведения о вражеских силах,

Как только Ваша команда обнаружит место крушения, мы пошлем команду, чтобы извлечь модуль, позаботьтесь об их защите.
Key.Italian:
Da quello che abbiamo appreso dalla nostra Inteligence, un UAV è stato abbattuto in questa area, recuperare il suo modulo è essenziale per noi perchè contiene informazioni critiche sulle forze nemiche

Una volta assicurata la zona dove è caduto, manderemo un team a recuperare il modulo, assicurati di proteggerlo.
Key.Portuguese:
Pelo que eu entendi de nossa inteligencia, um UAV foi derrubado nessa area, retirar sua caixa preta é essencial para o nosso time, contem informações criticas sobre as forças inimigas.

Uma vez que nosso time tiver protegido o local da queda, enviaremos um time para retirar a caixa preta, certifique-se de protege-los.
Assistencia: Caixa preta do UAV recuperada

Key.English: Headquarters: reconnaissance reported, in the locality %1 there are tourists of the union state. A group of tourists has very important information
Key.French: Quartier général: reconnaissance signalée, dans la localité %1 il y a des touristes de l'état unioniste. Un groupe de touristes a des informations très importantes
Key.German: Hauptquartier: Aufklärung hat berichtet, in der Lokalität %1 gibt es Touristen des Vereinigungsstaates. Eine Gruppe von Touristen hat sehr wichtige Informationen
Key.Italian: Sede centrale: ricognizione segnalata, nella località %1 ci sono i turisti dello stato dell'unione. Un gruppo di turisti ha informazioni molto importanti
Key.Portuguese: Sede: reconhecimento de reconhecimento, na localidade %1 há turistas do estado sindical. Um grupo de turistas tem informações muito importantes
Key.Russian: Штаб: разведка доложила, в населенном пункте %1 находятся туристы союзного государства. Группа туристов обладает очень важными сведениями

Key.English: It is necessary to release the settlement and talk to them! In order to avoid getting civilians under attack, clean out the point from the insurgents before announcing it to ours!
Key.French: Il est nécessaire de libérer le règlement et de leur parler! Afin d'éviter que les civils ne soient attaqués, nettoyez le point des insurgés avant de l'annoncer aux nôtres!
Key.German: Es ist notwendig, die Siedlung freizugeben und mit ihnen zu reden! Um zu vermeiden, dass Zivilisten unter Beschuss geraten, räumen Sie den Aufständischen den Punkt ab, bevor Sie es uns ankündigen!
Key.Italian: È necessario liberare l'insediamento e parlare con loro! Per evitare di attirare i civili sotto attacco, ripulisci il punto dagli insorti prima di annunciarlo ai nostri!
Key.Portuguese: É necessário liberar o assentamento e conversar com eles! Para evitar que os civis sejam atacados, limpe o ponto dos insurgentes antes de anunciar ao nosso!
Key.Russian: Необходимо освободить населенный пункт и поговорить с ними! Во избежании попадания гражданских под удар зачистите пункт от повстанцев, перед тем как объявить его нашим!

Key.English: Release the town where tourists hide
Key.French: Libérez la ville où les touristes se cachent
Key.German: Löse die Stadt, in der sich Touristen verstecken
Key.Italian: Rilascia la città in cui i turisti si nascondono
Key.Portuguese: Solte a cidade onde os turistas se escondem
Key.Russian: Освободить город, в котором прячутся туристы

Key.English: Headquarters: One or more of the civilians has benn killed! How can I now explain to the Foreign Ministry what happened to %1
Key.French: Quartier général: Un des civils a été tué! Comment puis-je maintenant expliquer au ministère des Affaires étrangères ce qui est arrivé à %1
Key.German: Hauptquartier: Einer der Zivilisten wurde getötet! Wie kann ich dem Außenministerium jetzt erklären, was mit %1 passiert ist?
Key.Italian: Quartier generale: uno dei civili è stato ucciso! Come posso spiegare al Ministero degli Esteri cosa è successo a %1
Key.Portuguese: Sede: Um dos civis foi morto! Como posso agora explicar ao Ministério das Relações Exteriores o que aconteceu com %1
Key.Russian: Штаб: Один из несколько гражднаских было убито! Как мне теперь объяснять в МИДе что случилось с %1

Key.English: Headquarters: Excellent work, gentlemen! We received very valuable information, now our side knows from where the enemy began the invasion of these lands! For special service fighter [%1] will receive a bonus
Key.French: Quartier général: Excellent travail, messieurs! Nous avons reçu des informations très précieuses, maintenant notre camp sait d'où l'ennemi a commencé l'invasion de ces terres! Pour le combattant de service spécial [%1] recevra un bonus
Key.German: Hauptquartier: Ausgezeichnete Arbeit, meine Herren! Wir haben sehr wertvolle Informationen erhalten, jetzt weiß unsere Seite, woher der Feind die Invasion dieser Länder begonnen hat! Für den speziellen Service erhält der Kämpfer [%1] einen Bonus
Key.Italian: Staff: lavoro eccellente, signori! Abbiamo ricevuto informazioni preziose, ora la nostra parte sa da dove il nemico ha iniziato l'invasione di queste terre! Per il combattente di servizi speciali [%1] riceverà un bonus
Key.Portuguese: Staff: Excelente trabalho, senhores! Recebemos informações muito valiosas, agora nosso lado sabe de onde o inimigo começou a invasão dessas terras! Para o lutador de serviço especial [%1] receberá um bônus
Key.Russian: Штаб: Отличная работа, господа! Мы получили очень ценные сведения, теперь нашей стороне известно от куда противник начал вторжение в эти земли! За особую выслугу боец [%1] получит премию

Key.English: Headquarters: Civilians must successfully reach the building with a bunker
Key.French: Siège: les civils doivent atteindre le bâtiment avec un bunker
Key.German: Hauptquartier: Zivilisten müssen das Gebäude mit einem Bunker erfolgreich erreichen
Key.Italian: Sede: i civili devono raggiungere con successo l'edificio con un bunker
Key.Portuguese: Sede: os civis devem alcançar o edifício com um bunker
Key.Russian: Штаб: Гражданские должны успешно добраться до здания с бункером

Key.English: Headquarters: %1 passed under the control of the enemy! Contact with civilians is lost forever
Key.French: Siège: %1 passé sous le contrôle de l'ennemi! Le contact avec les civils est perdu pour toujours
Key.German: Hauptquartier: %1 ging unter der Kontrolle des Feindes! Kontakt mit Zivilisten ist für immer verloren
Key.Italian: Quartier generale: %1 passato sotto il controllo del nemico! Il contatto con i civili è perso per sempre
Key.Portuguese: Sede: %1 passou sob o controle do inimigo! Contato com civis está perdido para sempre
Key.Russian: Штаб: %1 перешел под контроль противника! Контакт с гражданскими навсегда утерян

Key.English: Headquarters: Our patrols found a group of unknown civilians in point %1, after interrogation it was found out that these persons were going to inform the enemy about our starting deployment! For the interception of donors, the command will increase supplies
Key.French: Quartier général: Nos patrouilles ont trouvé un groupe de civils inconnus au point %1, après un interrogatoire, il a été découvert que ces personnes allaient informer l'ennemi de notre déploiement de départ! Pour l'interception des donateurs, le commandement augmentera les fournitures
Key.German: Hauptquartier: Unsere Patrouillen haben eine Gruppe von unbekannten Zivilisten in Punkt %1 gefunden, nach der Befragung wurde herausgefunden, dass diese Personen den Feind über unseren Starteinsatz informieren würden! Für die Überwachung von Gebern wird das Kommando die Versorgung erhöhen
Key.Italian: Sede: le nostre pattuglie hanno trovato un gruppo di civili sconosciuti al punto %1, dopo l'interrogatorio è stato scoperto che queste persone avrebbero informato il nemico del nostro schieramento di partenza! Per l'intercettazione dei donatori, il comando aumenterà le forniture
Key.Portuguese: Sede: Nossas patrulhas encontraram um grupo de civis desconhecidos no ponto %1, depois do interrogatório descobriu-se que essas pessoas iriam informar o inimigo sobre o nosso desdobramento inicial! Para a interceptação de doadores, o comando aumentará os suprimentos
Key.Russian: Штаб: Наши потрули обнаружили в пункте %1 группу неизвестных гражданских, после допроса выяснилось, что данные лица собирались донести противнику сведения о нашей стартовой дислокации! За перехват донощиков командование увеличит поставки

Key.German: +%1 Versorgung für das Abfangen von Denunzianten

Key.English: Headquarters: You need to get information from the local!
Key.French: Siège: Vous devez obtenir des informations auprès de la section locale!
Key.German: Hauptquartier: Sie müssen Informationen vom Einheimischen erhalten!
Key.Italian: Sede: è necessario ottenere informazioni dal locale!
Key.Portuguese: Sede: Você precisa obter informações do local!

Key.English:
The IR smoke improve the current smoke deployment system.

All vehicles equiped with this system have a chance to dodge IR Locked projectile as long as they remain in the deployed smoke
Key.French:
L'écran de fumée IR améliore les véhicules disposant d'un système de déploiement de fumée standard.

Tout véhicule équipé de ce système a une chance d'éviter les projectiles IR tant qu'il reste dans l'écran de fumée
Key.German:
The IR smoke improve the current smoke deployment system.

All vehicles equiped with this system have a chance to dodge IR Locked projectile as long as they remain in the deployed smoke
Key.Russian:
(IR smoke) Дымовая завеса для наземной техники.

Вся наземная техника, оборудованная системой выброса дымовых шашек, получает возможность использовать данную систему
Key.Italian:
The IR smoke improve the current smoke deployment system.

All vehicles equiped with this system have a chance to dodge IR Locked projectile as long as they remain in the deployed smoke
Key.Portuguese:
A fumaça Infra Vermelha melhora o sistema de liberação de fumaça.

Todos os Veículos equipados com esse sistema tem uma chance de desviar de misseis travados através de Infra Vermelho, contanto que eles se mantenham dentro da fumaça

Key.Russian: Данное улучшение позволяет определять противовоздушному радару тип воздушной техники
Key.Italian: Questo miglioramento consente di determinare il tipo di veicolo aereo
Key.Portuguese: Essa melhoria permite que você determine o tipo de Veículo aéreo

Key.English: You can not play this mission because the following add-ons were not connected
Key.French: Vous ne pouvez pas jouer cette mission car les add-ons suivants n'étaient pas connectés

Key.English: You have played in the other team earlier during this round and you've been locked to that side. Teamswapping is not allowed to keep the game fair. Please join the the other team
Key.French: You have played in the other team earlier during this round and you've been locked to that side. Teamswapping is not allowed to keep the game fair. Please join the the other team
Key.German: Du hast in dieser Runde bereits im gegnerischen Team gespielt und wurdest ihm zugewiesen. Um das Spiel fair zu halten, ist ein Seitenwechsel nicht erlaubt. Bitte tritt dem gegnerischen Team bei
Key.Russian: Вы уже выбрали фракцию, за которую будете воевать в текущей партии игры. Смена фракции запрещена, нам нужна честная игра. Пожалуйста, выберите другую сторону конфликта
Key.Italian: You have played in the other team earlier during this round and you've been locked to that side. Teamswapping is not allowed to keep the game fair. Please join the other team
Key.Portuguese: Você jogou no outro time mais cedo, durante essa partida você esta vinculado ào time que jogou mais cedo. Trocar de time não é permitido, para que se mantenha o jogo justo. Por favor junte-se ao outro time

Key.English: Capturing %1 is essential to our team, neutralizing %1 Depot will ensure it's capture.
Key.French: Capturer %1 est éssentiel à notre équipe, neutraliser le Dépot de %1 pour procéder à la capture.
Key.German:
Die Ortschaft %1 zu erobern, ist für unser Team von großer Wichtigkeit!
Neutralisiere den Feind und besetze das zentrale Depot, um somit die Stadt einzunehmen.
Key.Russian: Захват %1 имеет большое значение для нас. Захватите бункер в центре для захвата города.
Key.Italian: Conquistare %1 è fondamentale per il nostro Team, neutralizza il deposito di %1 per catturarlo.
Key.Portuguese: Capturar %1 é essencial para o nosso time, neutralizar %1 O deposito central vai assegurar que esta capturada.

Key.English: <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> has been captured by our team, Defending <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> Depot and Camps might be necessary to prevent enemies from taking it
Key.French: Notre équipe à capturé <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker>, la défense du Dépot de <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> et de ses Camps sera peut être nécessaire pour empêcher l'énemie de s'en emparer
Key.German:
Die Ortschaft %1 wurde von unserem Team eingenommen.
Um sie zu halten, müssen das Depot und die Camps von %1 unter allen Umständen verteidigt werden. Der Feind darf keine Chance bekommen, den Ort zurückzuerobern!
Key.Russian: <цель='%1Склад (Depot)'>%1<marker> было захвачено вашей командой, Защитите <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> контролировать склад и лагеря необходимо для контроля города
Key.Italian: <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> è stato catturata dal tuo team, difendere <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> Depositi e Campi è essere necessario per evitare che vengano catturati dai nemici
Key.Portuguese: <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> Foi capturado pelo nosso time, Defendendo <marker name='%1Depot'>%1<marker> O deposito e as casamatas é necessario para impedir que inimigos capturem

Key.English: After selecting a mission, you will have to capture the Town Depot of the selected town, don't forget that capturing the camps around the depot will give you a respawn possibility in this town
Key.French: Après avoir acceptée une mission, vous devez capturer le Dépot de la ville, capturer les camps autours de celui-ci aiderons à sa capture
Key.German: Nachdem du einen Auftrag angenommen hast, musst du die Stadt einnehmen. Begebe dich dazu zum Depot (der große Bunker oder Turm in der Stadtmitte). Nehme vorher jedoch mindestens ein Camp ein, denn dort kannst du dann wieder einsteigen (Respawn), sofern diese Option aktiviert ist
Key.Russian: После выбора задания вам необходимо захватить склад города. Захват лагерей поможет в захвате города
Key.Italian: Dopo aver selezionato una missione, dovrai catturare il Deposito Centrale della Città selezionata, non dimenticare che catturare i campi intorno al deposito ti daranno una possibilità di respawn nella città
Key.Portuguese: Depois de selecionar uma missão, você deve capturar o centro da cidade selecionada, não se esqueça de primeiro capturar as casamatas em volta da cidade, que habilitará renascer nessa mesma cidade
